description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.U5Mbv0JddMMputqu]{Tempered Pilgrim}

You understand a variety of social cues and are quick to take advantage of them when you interact with others. When you exceed the DC of a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C]{Diplomacy} check to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C#change-attitude]{improve a creature's attitude} by 5 or more, you need to spend only 1 extra minute interacting with the creature to improve its attitude by one additional category. In addition, you worsen a creature's attitude only if you fail the Diplomacy check to improve its attitude by 10 or more.
